description.value:
Rare Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement. Failing Toughness Test, target immediately suffers Blood Loss.

Requirements

Good Craftsmanship can delay effect by 1 round, Best can delay by up to 24 hours, chosen on acquisition/creation. Temporarily replaces the "Toxic" Wep. Quality's effect if applied.

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
description.summary: Rare Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement. Failing Toughness Test, target immediately suffers Blood Loss.
